name: Spicy Chicken Noodle Soup
author: Islandartist
summary: A simple and quick one-pot soup that tastes amazing! Cut carrots into matchsticks if you are in a fancy mood.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, diced
1 (8 ounce) package dried thin rice noodles
½ teaspoon chili pepper flakes, or to taste
directions: Cook and stir chicken in a large pot over medium heat until lightly browned, about 5 minutes; stir in garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir vegetable broth, carrots, and corn into chicken mixture; bring to a boil
Stir rice noodles, red pepper, basil, and chili flakes into chicken mixture; reduce heat and simmer until noodles are tender, about 5 minutes
